extendedInfo.description: Play âDrug Quiz FREEâ to help yourself learn and/or review U.S.-market prescription/over-the-counter BRAND & GENERIC drug names. The paid version has over 1200 medications listed! Great for pharmacy students, pharmacists, medical students, doctors, nursing students, nurses, and any other healthcare professionals who seek to master their drug name knowledge.      The âDrug Name Challengeâ gives you the option to guess brand or generic name as well as answer 1 - 25 questions in a multiple choice format. The paid version also gives you the option of answering 100 questions. You can also use the Search Mode to assist you in your learning.Game designed and drug list compiled by Jeffrey Dearman PharmD.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I liked how accurate it was! Thinking of buying the full version
reviews.author: nancy hernandez
